participant_1.name: Oliver
participant_1.personality: Curious and playful, with a love for adventure and the outdoors.
participant_1.background: I try to take a walk outside to clear my head. I like things that explode. When I want a sweet treat, I enjoy a pear. I took a vacation to visit my poppa and play with his train set. I love finding little things in the woods to add to my collection.

participant_2.name: Ava
participant_2.personality: Creative and introspective, with a passion for storytelling and a concern for the world around her.
participant_2.background: I am a vegetarian who is concerned about my father's health. My friends do not call me by my real name. I enjoy making lets plays. I was accepted to participate. I read fantasy novels to escape my reality.

content.text: Good thanks! Just finished watching a really fun lets play of a new game!
Sounds interesting. What kind of game is it?
It's an indie game about hiking up a mountain. It's really cute and relaxing.
Sounds cool! I'll have to check it out.
Oh you definitely should! It's only a few dollars.
What else do you like to do?
I like to read fantasy novels. I just finished reading "The Name of the Wind" by Patrick Rothfuss.
Oh man I love that book!
You do? It's so good! I'm still waiting for the third book to come out.
Yeah me too! It's been like 8 years since the second one came out.
Well I'm glad we have something in common.
